name: Madsprite.com
body:
#### Welcome my site

I'm currently a student with a keen and constant evolving knowledge of security. This is one of my side projects to learn the aspects of the online space I can occupy and manage. There's currently not much to see here, so enjoy and if you have any questions message me on twitter @MadSprite_Isec
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
